remarks: Closure of the metric in a binary structure product.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)
statement:
xpsds.t $e |- T = ( R Xs. S ) $.
xpsds.x $e |- X = ( Base ` R ) $.
xpsds.y $e |- Y = ( Base ` S ) $.
xpsds.1 $e |- ( ph -> R e. V ) $.
xpsds.2 $e |- ( ph -> S e. W ) $.
xpsds.p $e |- P = ( dist ` T ) $.
xpsdsfn $p |- ( ph -> P Fn ( ( X X. Y ) X. ( X X. Y ) ) ) $.
